label: TTTransformationEvent
comment: Information about an event that captures the relationship between one or more physical or digital objects identified by identifiers, such as an EPC (Electronic Product Code) or EPC class, that are fully or partially consumed as inputs or as outputs.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the business step for this TT aggregation event.
The code specifying the disposition related to this TT aggregation event.
An instance identifier for an input object of this TT transformation event.
A date, time, date time, or other date time of an occurrence in this supply chain schedule.
An instance identifier for an output object of this TT transformation event.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value at which this TT aggregation event was recorded.

objectProperties.comment: The business location related to this TT object event.
A destination related party for this TT aggregation event.

Information about an event in which a Track and Trace (TT) element of one of more physical or digital objects is identified by a specific object class identifier (such as an electronic product class), either a specific quantity or an unspecified quantity.

Information about an event in which a Track and Trace (TT) element of one of more physical or digital objects is identified by a specific object class identifier (such as an electronic product class), either a specific quantity or an unspecified quantity.
The read point related location of this TT aggregation event.
The process of certifying that a certain product, process or organization has passed performance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in a standard or regulation.
A source related party for this TT aggregation event.
A notification that an error has occurred.
A trade transaction specified for this TT aggregation event.
